RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::HashPassword

RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::HashPassword Class Reference

#include <hashpassword.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Class used to compute password's hashsum.

The SHA-1 algorythm used by this class has been implemented by Paul E. Jones <paulej@arid.us>

Compare two hashsums.

It is due to null-terminal char not handled by strcmp.
